ca.ualberta.lard.test

Class CommentActivityTests

  • java.lang.Object
      • ca.ualberta.lard.test.CommentActivityTests

  • public class CommentActivityTests
extends
    Tests CommentActivity UI functionality. Tests that all the buttons in the action bar work when clicked and that another CommentActivity is started when a child comment is clicked.
    Author:
    Victoria

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommentActivityTests() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testFavourites()
      Tests that the parent comment of the list is added to the favourites list when the favourite button in the action bar is clicked.
      void testListViewIsVisable()
      Tests that all parts of the parent comment and its list of child comments can be seen on the screen.
      void testReceiveId()
      Tests that when the activity is started, a comment id is received.
      void testReply()
      Tests that a NewCommentActivity is opened when the reply button in the action bar is clicked and that the id of the parent comment is sent.
      void testSave()
      Tests that the parent comment of the list is saved locally when the reply button in the action bar is clicked.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
